column2: Report of the Introduction of Elections in the Municipality of George Town, Penang, 1951. Refer to Other Sources section of the Metadata to learn additional sources used for the data sheets

Candidate spellings follow 1951 report of George Town Elections. There are alternate values for total ballot issued for Tanjong (5431), Kelawei  (2439) and Jelutong (4293). No definitions provided for spoilt papers and tendered votes. All wards are multi members and voters may cast for more than one candidate per ward. Due to this, total valid votes for all candidates do not tally up for total ballots issued. No information about candidates losing deposits. TindakMalaysia Network Services PLT is not responsible for any errors or omissions arising from the original data or its derivatives.

Votes for Candidates and Count of Rejected Ballots
If the candidate won uncontested, 'Y' is affixed. If there is a contested seat, no value is affixed
